text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with tomatoes that's right

about 3/4 of a pint of cherry tomatoes

what I thought I was gonna put a little

real slow oven for a few hours and kind

tomatoes it was a good theory but here's

you got to use a real slow oven for this
stuff I used 175 degrees that's as low
as my oven goes and after a couple hours
they were not dry they were just kind of
wrinkly so yes I ended up cooking them
12 hours they went overnight
surprisingly when I picked one up and
kind of felt it it was dry it was at
amazing Michelle thought they tasted
pretty good
I don't really like sun-dried tomatoes
so I don't know if they're any good or
not they do seem sweeter than regular
sun-dried tomatoes and I went ahead and
I stored them in some olive oil but when
I figured out here and why this was so
dumb I got like two tablespoons of
sun-dried cherry tomatoes and it took me
12 hours and I used a lot of gas and I'm

really stupid video to do I don't
